org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

接口 ClusterSchema

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ClusterSchemaService

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ClusterSchema
    View and edit the current cluster schema. Use this API making any modification to namespaces, tables, etc.

    Implementation Notes

    Nonces are for when operation is non-idempotent to ensure once-only semantic, even across process failures.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int DEFAULT_HBASE_MASTER_CLUSTER_SCHEMA_OPERATION_TIMEOUT
      Default operation timeout in milliseconds.
      static String HBASE_MASTER_CLUSTER_SCHEMA_OPERATION_TIMEOUT_KEY
      Timeout for cluster operations in milliseconds.

        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableNamespaceManager

        TableNamespaceManager getTableNamespaceManager()
        For internals use only. Do not use! Provisionally part of this Interface. Prefer the high-level APIs available elsewhere in this API.
        返回:
        Instance of TableNamespaceManager

      • createNamespace

        long createNamespace(NamespaceDescriptor namespaceDescriptor,
                     NonceKey nonceKey,
                     org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.ProcedurePrepareLatch latch)
              throws IOException
        Create a new Namespace.
        参数:
        namespaceDescriptor - descriptor for new Namespace
        nonceKey - A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
        latch - A latch to block on for precondition validation
        返回:
        procedure id
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException

      • modifyNamespace

        long modifyNamespace(NamespaceDescriptor descriptor,
                     NonceKey nonceKey,
                     org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.ProcedurePrepareLatch latch)
              throws IOException
        Modify an existing Namespace.
        参数:
        nonceKey - A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
        latch - A latch to block on for precondition validation
        返回:
        procedure id
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException

      • deleteNamespace

        long deleteNamespace(String name,
                     NonceKey nonceKey,
                     org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.ProcedurePrepareLatch latch)
              throws IOException
        Delete an existing Namespace. Only empty Namespaces (no tables) can be removed.
        参数:
        nonceKey - A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
        latch - A latch to block on for precondition validation
        返回:
        procedure id
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException

      • getNamespace

        NamespaceDescriptor getNamespace(String name)
                          throws IOException
        Get a Namespace
        参数:
        name - Name of the Namespace
        返回:
        Namespace descriptor for name
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws ClusterSchemaException and InterruptedIOException as well as IOException

      • getNamespaces

        List<NamespaceDescriptor> getNamespaces()
                                 throws IOException
        Get all Namespaces
        返回:
        All Namespace descriptors
        抛出:
        IOException
